metadata.title: CVE-2019-20352 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.15rc0, a heap-based buffer over-read occurs(via a crafted .asm file) in set_text_free when called fromexpand_one_smacro in asm/preproc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-20352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.15.04-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.04-1').
